title: HELP WITH PURCHASES
body: Hey guys i am living in UK but i want to purchase RP and i am playing league on NA Region with my credit card that has pounds on it cna i still purchase the RP??

replies.body: There are still a few different payment options for you to choose from! You could try using Paypal, but also double check our [**payment method**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203701590) page as well for some other options. Keep in mind though, RP cards are region specific so cards purchased in the UK will not work for NA.
